channel.title: Idea on Bringing back an 'ol type of server
channel.description:
Well, me and a fellow mate of mine, have been developing a server recently, intent on making it just a "Login and PK" server.
You will be able to exchange PK Points, for rares. You will start with an OK bank, more than the average. NPC's will drop LARGE sums of cash, grossing at about 50k. Certain NPC, will drop rune, but you have to EXCHANGE pk points, to go there, and theres a timer. F2P server, based on Demonik/Divine. Hosted on a Dedi, up 22/7, as that's what it WILL be...(no lie, unlike others =p) XP-Rate will be moderate, 450x on Week's, and 750x on Weekends.
So, if you would prefer a server like that, please post, and give me and suggestions......(We have already purchased the dedi, so we are testing all suggestions atm.)

item.title: Idea on Bringing back an 'ol type of server
item.dc:creator: @Ll_Faken_Ll Ll Faken Ll
item.description:
@Ll_Faken_Ll wrote:

Lawl, 'igh, i understand… Any more suggestions?

Read full topic

item.title: Idea on Bringing back an 'ol type of server
item.dc:creator: @bigh51 bigh51
item.description:
@bigh51 wrote:

[quote=“jayjohn, post:16, topic:232020”]Sorry Ll its not you, its the post and bigh lol i told you but serious are you ever gonna make a server?[/quote]I can’t host a server because my isp has all my ports closed and will only open them if I pay them, which I’m not going to. And I cba to get/can’t afford a vps/dedi, and I don’t trust anyone with my source so the answer is a simple: No. Sorry.

Read full topic

item.title: Idea on Bringing back an 'ol type of server
item.dc:creator: @Ll_Faken_Ll Ll Faken Ll
item.description:
@Ll_Faken_Ll wrote:

Most servers these days, aren’t 24/7, except for a few. I plan on getting huge ddos atks, as some bitch narb will try to take it down, and they might succeed…even though i’ll only allow 5 connections per IP.(Have already bought Firewall)

And, why the fuck you think i’m not a coder?

@jayjohn - Wow, nice ‘asking’ for mod, when i don’t know you, and i stated it’s not up? this is for development, and usggestions…

@bigh51- Nice suggestion! I’ll have to get some help with that from some other members, as i don’t get the basics, bot other than that ,i’ll try it!

@K09 - No shit? i know how many hours in a day there are… But just like your server, it’s not close to 24/7, so i tell the truth, cause it’s obvious it will get ddosed, but it will come back up.

Thnx for help everyone! Keep posting more sugestions.

Read full topic

item.title: Idea on Bringing back an 'ol type of server
item.dc:creator: @KO9 KO9
item.description:
@KO9 wrote:

Ll Faken Ll:

Hosted on a Dedi, up 22/7, as that’s what it WILL be…(no lie, unlike others =p)

So you’re gonna have a month downtime every year?

Plus unless you’re one rich ass mofo you can’t guarantee 100% uptime. There are some sad fuckers on here who will do everything they can to take you offline. That involves spending $100’s on botnets. Which means unless you have some sexual transit providers that can handle DDoS attacks of 100’s of mbps, you’ll fail epically.

Read full topic
